description:
"Hannibal" fans will have to wait a little bit longer to get a taste of Season 3. NBC chairman Robert Greenblatt announced Friday (Jan. 16) at the winter TV press tour that the gory drama will be getting a summer premiere in 2015. The first two seasons debuted in the spring.《汉尼拔》粉丝们等第三季的时间有些漫长。NBC主席Robert Greenblatt周五宣布，第三季将会在2015年夏季开播。前两季都是在春季开播。

"I thought we had said this, but maybe we haven't, that 'Hannibal's' going to be back in the summer," Greenblatt says. "It's a show we love."“我想我以前说过，我记不太清了。不过这部颇受喜爱的美剧将会在今年夏季回归。”Greenblatt说。

The last time viewers saw Hannibal Lecter, he may have killed literally all the other main characters on the show. Few details are known about Season 3, however it is has been previously reported the series will pick up with Hannibal in Italy cavorting with Belinda (Gillian Anderson), and it will be revealed just who is alive and dead in the first few episodes.
上一季观众们看到了Hannibal Lecter基本上杀掉了剧中的其他主角们。目前第三季的相关信息发布得不是很多，之前有消息称剧情会从Hannibal和Belinda一起在意大利生活开始。

title: 《汉尼拔》第三季今年夏季开播
